attributes.action: Abolish Emergency radio charges for RNLI and other volenteer life saving organisations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Removal of current emergency radio charges of £48000 (50% of current fee)from RNLI  scrap current proposal to increase these charges considerably
Fees such as these should be abolished for all volenteer life saving organisations

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
